name: Wunderlist Dark Theme
description: Darkify wunderlist. Dark gray background, white font and dark blue highlighting.
additional_info:
Updated:
  - Folder background fixed
  - Selected lists now display itemcount correctly
  - Subtasks textcolor fixed

If something does not work for you (if it does not look like in the pictures) or if you have suggestions go ahead and mail me some information (a screenshot would be best) and I will try to fix it! (benkosmann@gmail.com)
